stories.body:
Kasımdaki ABD seçimleri dünyanın seyrini değiştirecek. Altın her zamanki gibi güvenli liman olacak. Afrika ülkeleri karışabilir. Elektrikli araç satışlarında patlama yaşanacak.
Emre ERGÜL 2024’ün yatırım yüz akı altın olacak
 Jeopolitik gerilimler, ekonomik belirsizlik ve enflasyonun hala olması gerekenden yüksek olmasının “güvenli liman” altını 2024’te parlatacağına inanan ABD’li ekonomistler, yatırım için altının tercih edilmesinin 5 nedenini sıraladı.
 1) Riski azaltmak için portföyünüzü çeşitlendirir. Amerikan CBS Televizyonu, “Tüm yumurtalarınızı tek bir sepete koymak (en azından yatırım açısından) her zaman risklidir” diye başladığı haberinde, yatırımcıyı uyardı: “Borsaya yoğun yatırım yapıyorsanız ve S&P 500 düşerse, genel servetiniz de düşer.
 Emlak yatırımında büyükseniz ve başka bir balon patlarsa, önemli miktarda nakit paranız tükenir. Oysa altınla servetinizi daha iyi koruyabilirsiniz.” CBS’e konuşan Global X ETF'leri Araştırma Direktörü Rohan Reddy de 2024 için altın tavsiyesinde bulunuyor: "Altının diğer riskli varlıklarla uzun vadeli korelasyonu diğer varlıkların çoğundan daha düşük, bu da onu arzu edilen bir portföy çeşitlendirici kılıyor.
 Genel riski azalttığı defalarca kanıtlandı."Örnek mi? 21 Eylül 1976-6 Mart 1978 arasında S&P 500, yüzde 19'un üzerinde düştü. Peki altın fiyatları? GoldSilver'a göre neredeyse yüzde 54 oranında artış gösterdi. Benzer bir eğilim 2007-2009 durgunluğunda da yaşanmıştı. Bu süre zarfında S&P yüzde 57 düşerken; altın yüzde 25 arttı.
 2) Piyasa belirsizliğine karşı korunmak için güvenli liman. Jeopolitik çatışmalar istikrarsızlığa yol açar ve bu gerçekleştiğinde yatırımcılar ve tüketiciler, politik olarak ne olursa olsun paralarının korunacağı ve değerini koruyacağı bir yere sığınma eğilimindedir. Kıt bir varlık olarak altın, güvenli liman seçeneğini sunuyor. Kanıt mı?
 İsrail-Gazze savaşıona bakalım. İlk saldırının ertesi günü olan 8 Ekim'den itibaren altın fiyatları ons başına bin 809 dolardan bin 983 dolara yükseldi ve yalnızca birkaç hafta içinde yüzde 5'lik bir artış kaydetti. CBS’e konuşan Allegiance Gold'un kurucu ortağı Alex Ebkarian, "Bu jeopolitik istikrarsızlığın yanısıra dünya çapında devam eden diğer sorunlar (Ukrayna Savaşı, ABD-Çin ticaret gerilimleri vb.) nedeniyle yatırımcılar 2024'te altın gibi güvenli liman varlıklarına yönelmeye devam edecek" açıklamasını yaptı.
 3) Devam eden enflasyona karşı koruma sağlıyor. Altının enflasyona karşı akıllı bir koruma olarak da bilindiğine dikkat çeken CBS, “Kağıt paranın satın alma gücünü kaybederken bile servetinizi korumanıza olanak tanır” yorumunu yaptı ve ekledi: “Bunun nedeni kıt olmasıdır; daha fazlasını yaratamazsınız, dolayısıyla doların yapabileceği gibi arz fazlası nedeniyle değeri düşemez.” Global X ETF'leri Araştırma Direktörü Rohan Reddy’nin belirttiği gibi, "Altın, değerini koruma konusunda bir geçmişe sahip, ekonomik istikrarsızlık zamanlarında güvenli bir sığınak ve enflasyona karşı potansiyel bir koruma görevi görüyor."
 4) Kriz durumunda paranızı korur. Bu başlık için Noble Gold Investments CEO'su Collin Plume’e kulak verelim: “Merkez bankalarının kendi ülkelerinin zenginliğini korumak için altın kullanmasının ve milyarderlerin milyarlarını korumak için altın kullanmasının bir nedeni var. Parayı bilen biri varsa, o da onlar." Plume, bir tür mali kriz durumunda altın varlıklarının da yardımcı olabileceğini söylüyor: "Altının kendi tarafında bir tarih var. Ortalama olarak her 5.5 yılda bir mali kriz yaşıyoruz. Bu çöküşlerin her birinde, altın ya çöküş sırasında ya da hemen sonrasında yükselişe geçiyor. Başka hiçbir varlık bunu yapmadı.”
 5) Her zaman paraya çevrilir. CBS, ekonomistlerin şu ortak görüşünü yayınladı: “Her zaman talep görmektedir ve istediğiniz zaman alabilir veya satabilirsiniz. Beklenmedik harcamalarınız olması, işinizi kaybetmeniz veya başka bir şekilde zor zamanlar geçirmeniz durumunda bu yararlı olabilir. Ayrıca belirsiz ekonomik zamanlarda güzel bir finansal güvenlik ağı olabilir.”
 CNN: Bu yıl 8 yeni 'EV've hibrit araç ABD yollarına çıkacak Chevrolet Equinox EV: Piyasada çok sayıda elektrikli SUV olsa da Chevrolet Equinox EV, fiyatıyla öne çıkacak. ABD’deki satış fiyatlarının 30 bin dolardan başlması bekleniyor ki, bu aracı en ucuz elektrikli araçlardan biri yapacak.
 Volvo EX30: 35 bin dolarlık açılış fiyatıyla bir başka ucuz elektrikli araç…CNN’e göre EX30, piyasadaki en uygun fiyatlı EV'ler arasında yer alacak ve en ucuz versiyon bile tahmini 440 km menzil sunacak.
 Volkwagen ID. Buzz: Minik benzinli motoruyla klasik olandan çok daha fazla, 330 beygir gücüne kadar güç üretebilen elektrik motorlarına sahip dört tekerlekten çekişli versiyonu da satışa sunulacak.
 Cadillac Celestiq: Bu elektrikli aracın fiyatları, en ucuz Equinox EV'nin 10 katı. Yaklaşık 300 bin dolardan başlıyor. Cadillac son yıllarda bu düzeyde bir zenginliğe işaret eden birkaç konsept otomobili tanıtmıştı.
 Toyota Land Cruiser: Model, üç yıl sonra farklı biçimde ABD pazarına geri dönüyor. Bu sefer, daha küçük, retro tarzı bir SUV. Doğrudan Jeep Wrangler ve bir başka klasik olan Ford Bronco'ya karşı yarışıyor.
 Ferrari Purosangue: 715 beygir gücünde bir V12 motorla çalışan Purosangue, bu uzun gövde stiliyle bile gelişmiş bir süspansiyon sistemine sahiptir. Fiyatlar 400 bin dolardan başlıyor.
 Ram 1500 Ramcharger: 2024’ün sonlarına doğru piyasaya çıkacak. Markanın ilk tamamen elektrikli kamyonu ve yeniden şarj edilmeden önce 800 kilometre sürüş menziliyle satışa sunulacak.
 Honda Prologue: Prologue, Honda'nın ilk gerçek ana akım EV modeli olacak. GM'nin Ultium EV teknolojisi kullanılarak üretilecek. ABD’deki başlangıç fiyatı 50 bin olması bekleniyor.
 CNBC: IRC raporu: 17 ülkede karmaşa çıkabilir International Rescue Committee (IRC), dünya nüfusunun yüzde 10’unu temsil eden 17 ülkede yeni yılda kaos yaşanabileceğine dair rapor yayınladı.
 İşte o liste: SUDAN: Nisan ayında ülkedeki iki grup arasında çatışmalar başladı. 6 milyon insan yerinden yurdundan oldu. 25 milyon kişi de insani yardıma muhtaç.
 DEMOKRATİK KONGO CUMHURİYETİ: 44 milyon seçmenin oy kullandığı seçimler sonrası ülkede hükümet karşıtı yürüyüşler başladı. Ruanda destekli bölücü silahlı örgüt M23 de ülkenin doğusundaki Kivu’ya girdi.
 MYANMAR: Şubat 2021’deki askeri darbe sonrası çıkan iç savaş alevlenebilir.
 SAHRA ÜLKELERİ: Burkina Faso, Kamerun, Çad, Gambiya, Gine, Mali, Moritania, Nijer, Nijerya ve Senegal. Son 3 yıldır darbelerle boğuşan Sahra Çölü’nün altındaki bölge ülkelerinde bu yıl olaylar büyüyebilir.
 TAYVAN: Çin’in haritasına eklemek istediği ve ABD’nin desteklediği ada ülkesindeki seçimler büyük önem taşıyor.
 DİĞERLERİ: Haiti, Guetamala ve Etiyopya’da da 2024’te silah seslerinin duyulmasından endişe ediliyor.
 Ünlü hedge fon yöneticisinden 10 kehanet THE STREET
 ABD’li ekonomist Doug Kass, ekonomiden siyasete 2024’te yaşanması muhtemel 10 olayı sıraladı.
 1-Donald Trump engelleme ve komplo suçundan mahkum edilir: Eski Başkan Donald Trump ile mevcut Başkan Joe Biden arasında yapılan anlaşmada, Biden, Trump'ın 2024 Başkanlık yarışından ayrılmayı kabul etmesi karşılığında Trump'ı affeder.
 Vali Ron DeSantis hem Iowa hem de New Hampshire ön seçimlerini üçüncü sırada tamamlar ve yarıştan çekilir. Nikki Haley, Cumhuriyetçi Başkan adayı olur. Eylül başlarında, sağlık konusunda acil bir durumla karşı karşıya kalan Biden, tıpkı Trump gibi yarışı terk eder.
 Trump gerçekten yarıştan çekilmişse, Biden'ın yerine Vali Gavin Newsom seçilir. Trump hâlâ yarıştaysa (ve mahkum edilmemişse) ve Biden'ın acil bir sağlık durumu varsa, Demokratlar, Michelle Obama'yı mücadelenin içine çekmeye çalıştıktan sonra Vali Gretchen Whitmer'ı görevlendirir. Yarışma ister Haley/ Newsom, ister Trump/Whitmer arasında olsun, kazanan ilk kadın başkan olacak; ya Nikki Haley ya da Gretchen Whitmer.
 2-Petrol 110 doları görecek, Ukrayna toprak kaybedecek. Batı, Ukrayna ile savaşın gidişatına dair sabrını kaybetmeye devam edecek. Toprak paylaşımına ilişkin müzakerelerde Ukrayna, ülkenin doğusunu Rusya'ya bırakmak zorunda kalacak. Kuzey Kore, Rusya'nın desteğiyle Askerden Arındırılmış Bölge'de çatışmalara girecek ve Güney Kore'yi işgal etme tehdidinde bulunacak.
 Çin, Tayvan'ı işgal etmese de Güney Çin Denizi'nde saldırgan savaş oyunu taktiklerini sürdürecek. Rusya ve Suudi Arabistan'ın üretim kısıntısı konusunda komplo kurmasıyla petrol fiyatı varil başına 110 doları aşarken, ABD'de benzinin galon fiyatı 6 dolara yaklaşacak. Exxon Mobil (XOM), Occidental Petroleum (OXY) ve Chevron'un (CVX) hisseleri gelecek yıl üçte birden fazla artış gösterecek.
 3-Ne yumuşak ne sert iniş: ABD’de çok yavaş bir reel büyüme olacak. İşsizlik yüzde 4.50'nin altında kalırken ücretler yüzde 3 ila 4 oranında artacak. Çin ekonomisi şaşırtıcı bir toparlanmaya başlayarak, emtia fiyatlarının yükselmeye başlamasına ve petrolün fiyatında yavaş ama kalıcı bir iyileşmeye başlamasına neden olacak. Enflasyon çok daha düşük seviyelere inemeyecek; Fed'in hedefinin oldukça üzerinde kalacak.
 Federal Reserve, temmuzdan önce iki kez faiz indirimine gidecek. Bu politika hamleleri ve koşullar manşet enflasyonda yeniden canlanmaya yol açacak ve yaz sonunda petrol fiyatında daha fazla artışa neden olacak; bu da Fed'in faiz indirimi arzusunu karmaşık hale getirecek. Yılın son 6 ayında yurtiçi büyüme yavaşlamaya başlasa ve işsizlik artmaya başlasa da yılın geri kalanında başka bir faiz indirimi yaşanmayacak. Bugün yüzde 3.91 seviyesinde olan 10 yıllık Hazine tahvilinin getirisi hiçbir zaman yüzde 3.75'in altına düşmeyecek ve yılın büyük bölümünde yüzde 3.75 ile yüzde 4.75 arasında dalgalanacak.
 Yılın sonlarında ABD'de gelişen resesyon, bütçe açığının GSYİH yüzdesi olarak yüzde 10 ya da daha fazlasına yol açacak; bu da Hazine arzını ezip 10 yıllık getiriyi yeniden yüzde 5'in üzerine çıkaracak. ABD federal borç sorunu artık yatırımcılar tarafından göz ardı edilmiyor; 2024 sonlarında daha da büyüyecek ve önümüzdeki yıllarda yavaş yavaş ciddi bir sistemik sorun haline gelecek. Alacaklılar ABD borcunu satın almak için daha fazlasını talep edecek.
 4-Petrol fiyatı korkusunda S&P Endeksi 4 bin 100'ün altına düşecek. Tüm makroekonomik, jeopolitik ve siyasi dramaya rağmen, 2024'ün büyük bölümünde ticaret aralığı son yılların en dar bölgesi olacak. S&P Endeksi yılı yaklaşık yüzde 5-10'luk bir düşüşle kapatacak. Apple (AAPL) hisselerindeki düşüşün öncülüğünde Nasdaq yılı yüzde 10 ile yüzde 20 arasında kayıpla kapatır. Piyasa daha fazla genişlemez ve Russell Endeksi de yıl için bir kayıp sergiler; zira Russell'ın pek çok bileşeni finansal (borç çevirme) ve operasyonel olumsuzluklarla karşı karşıya.
 5-Apple, Çin ile ticaret gerilimlerinin artmasıyla büyük bir yüzdesel kayıp yaşar. Çin'in Huawei'yi desteklemesiyle dünyanın en büyük ve en popüler hissesi Apple, bu ülkede önemli pazar payı kaybeder ve genel gelirler 2024'te (2023'ün üzerinde) yeniden düşer. Bu arada, Google Anti-Tröst davası sonucunda Google (GOOGL), Apple'a 18 milyar dolarlık arama ücreti ödemeyi durdurur. Apple'ın hisseleri hisse başına 130 doların altına düşer. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.B), halihazırda büyük olan Apple hisselerini "ikiye katlayarak" konumunu yaklaşık iki milyar hisseye yükseltir.
 6-Bankacılık sektörü büyük kredi kayıplarına uğrayacak. Kredi sorunlarıyla ilgili korkular gerçekleşecek. Ticari gayrimenkulün fiyatı toparlanamayacak. Bir ticari emlak fiyaskosu dalgası yeni bir bölgesel bankacılık krizine neden olur ve FDIC'yi birkaç banka birleşmesini müzakere etmeye zorlar. 2024'te banka hisseleri, 2023'ün en düşük seviyelerine geri dönüyor.
 7-Wall Street'in en vahşi akbabaları - özel sermaye - paramparça olmak üzere. Özellikle yılın ikinci yarısında faiz oranlarının hâlâ yüksek olması ve küresel ekonominin yavaşlaması nedeniyle kredi faiz oranlarının sıfırlanması, özel kredi başarısızlığında lider konuma katkıda bulunuyor. Blackstone'un (BX) hisseleri, BREIT (Blackstone tarafından yönetilen özel emlak fonu) ve (BXMT)'nin yeni itfa baskılarına maruz kalmasının ardından üçte bir oranında düşer. Diğer özel sermaye hisselerinin (Apollo (APO) ve (KKR)) hisseleri, SEC'in özel sermaye sektörünün portföylerini gerçekçi bir şekilde pazarlamak için zamanında fiyatlandırmadaki başarısızlığına ilişkin bir soruşturma başlatmasıyla düşüşe geçer.
 8-Elon Musk'un ciddi bir bağımlılık sorunu yaşadığı ortaya çıkar. Rehabilitasyonda uzun süre kalmaya başlayan dünyanın en zengin insanı Elon Musk, şirketleri üzerindeki işletme kontrolünden geçici olarak vazgeçmek zorunda kalacak. Tesla'nın (TSLA) hisseleri 2023'ün en düşük seviyelerine gerileyecek.
 9-Warner Brothers ve Paramount Global zarar görecek. Warner Brothers Discovery (WBD) ve Paramount Global (PARA) operasyonel ve mali açıdan zarar görüyor ('kârsız refah'). Likidite krizinin eşiğinde olan Shari Redstone, Paramount'u (indirimli fiyatla) özel sermayeye satıyor. Disney'in (DIS) hisseleri, 70 dolardan işlem görüyor ve kurumsal akıncı Nelson Peltz büyük bir zararla satılıyor. Bill Ackman'ın Pershing Square hedge fonu Peltz'in hisselerini satın alıyor.
 10-JPMorgan Chase’de bayrak değişimi yaşanacak. JPMorgan Chase'ten (JPM) Jamie Dimon bankadan ayrılır. Marianne Lake, JPMorgan'ın CEO'su olur.

"The gold has a history of protecting its value, a safe shelter and a potential protection against inflation at times of economic instability," Global X ETF Research Director Rohan Reddy said.
4) Keeps your money in crisis.
With China supporting Huawei, the world's largest and most popular share, Apple loses a significant market share in this country, and overall revenues will fall again in 2024 (over 2023).
The decline in Apple (AAPL) shares led to the loss of between 10% and 20 per cent of the year in Nasdaq.

stories.title: Amerikan basınından tüketici ve yatırımcıya 2024 tüyoları

en.body:
The US elections in November will change the world's course. Gold will be a safe port as usual. African countries may be involved. There will be an explosion in the sale of electric vehicles.
Emre ERGÜL 2024 will be a hundredth-pint gold investment
US economists believe that geopolitical tensions, economic uncertainty and inflation will still be higher than needed in 2024, and US economists have outlined the 5 reasons why the gold for investment is to be preferred.
1) Customize your portfolio to reduce risk. "It is always risky to put all your eggs in one basket (at least in terms of investment)," American CBS Television said. "If you invest heavily in the stock market and if S&P 500 falls, your overall wealth will fall.
If you are big in real estate investment and another balloon explodes, a significant amount of cash will be wasted. You can better protect your wealth with gold." "The long-term correlation of gold with other risky assets is lower than most other assets, which makes it a desirable portfolio diversification," Rohan Reddy, director of research for Global X ETFs, told CBS.
The overall risk has been proven several times." Between 21 September 1976 and 6 March 1978, S&P fell more than 500% to 19 per cent. And the gold prices? According to GoldSilver, it has increased by almost 54 per cent. A similar trend was in the 2007-2009 recession. During this period, the S&P fell 57 per cent, while gold rose by 25 per cent.
2) safe port to be protected against market uncertainty. Geopolitical conflicts lead to instability, and when this happens, investors and consumers tend to seek refuge where their money will be protected and their value protected, regardless of their political circumstances. As a short asset, gold offers the option of safe ports. Evidence?
Let's see about the Israel-Gaze war. As of October 8th, the following day of the first attack, gold prices rose from $809,009 per person to $983,000, and increased by 5 per cent in just a few weeks. "This geopolitical instability will continue to be explained by investors, as well as other problems worldwide (the Ukrainian War, US-China trade tensions, etc.) and investors will continue to address safe ports like gold in 2024," Alex Ebkarian, co-founder of Allegian The app.
3) It provides protection against ongoing inflation. "Even when money loses the purchasing power, it allows you to protect your wealth," the CBS noted, noting that gold is also known as a smart protection against inflation, adding that "it is because it is rich; you can't create more, so you can do It cannot be reduced because of its zipper." "The gold has a history of protecting its value, a safe shelter and a potential protection against inflation at times of economic instability," Global X ETF Research Director Rohan Reddy said.
4) Keeps your money in crisis. "There is a reason that private banks use gold to preserve their own country's wealth and to protect billions of billions of dollars," said Nobel Gold Investments CEO Colin Plume. If there's anyone who knows the money, they are." "The gold has a date on its side," he says, adding that in the event of a kind of financial crisis, gold assets can also help. On average, we have a financial crisis every 5.5 years. Each of these crashes is rising during or after the fall of gold. No other assets did that."
5) Always translated into money. "He always sees demand and you can take the time or sell it. It may be useful if you have unexpected expenses, lost your job or otherwise had a difficult time. It could also be a good financial security network in uncertain economic times."
CNN: This year, 8 new EVs and hybrid vehicles will be on their way to the United States: Although there are many electric SUVs on the market, Chevrolet Equinox EV will come up with a price. Sales in the United States are expected to start at $30,000, which will be one of the cheapest electric vehicles.
Volvo EX30: $35,000 for the opening price and another cheap electric vehicle ... according to CNN, EX30 will be among the most affordable EVs on the market, and even the cheapest version will offer an estimated 440km of range.
VolkWagon ID. Buzz: Four-wheeled, 4-wheeler engines with power to power up to 330 horsepower will also be available for sale, much more than classical with a mini-fuel engine.
Cadillac Celestiq: The price of this electric vehicle is 10 times that of the cheapest Equinox EV. It starts at about $300,000. In recent years, Cadillac has introduced several concept cars, which point to a wealth of this level.
Toyota Land Cruiser: The model is returning to the US market differently three years later. This time, a smaller, retro-style SUV. He is directly competing against the Jeep Wrangler and another classic, Ford Bronco.
Ferrari Purosangue: The 715-horsepower-powered Purosangue, which has a long body style, has an advanced suspension system. Prices start at $400,000.
The Ram 1500 Ramcharger: It will be released by the end of 2024. The brand's first fully electric truck and 800km of driving will be available before being re-branded.
Honda Prologue: Prologue will be Honda's first real-flow EV model. It will be produced using GM's Ultium EV technology. The initial price in the United States is expected to be 50,000.
NRC: The IRC report: The International Rescue Committee (IRC) has published a report that could lead to chaos in 17 countries, representing 10% of the world's population.
Here is the list: SUDAN: Conflicts began between the two groups in the country in April. Six million people came from their homes. Twenty-five million people are committed to humanitarian aid.
DEMOKRATIVE KOGO CUMMURIT: Anti-government rallies began in the country after the vote of 44 million voters. Rwanda-backed separatist armed organisation M23 also entered the country's eastern Kivu.
MYANMAR: The civil war that followed the military coup in February 2021 could be fought.
The following are the names of the three countries: Burkina Faso, Cameroon, Chad, Gambia, Guinea, Mali, Mauritania, Nigeria, Nigeria and Senegal. This year, events could grow in countries under the Sahara Desert, which has been hit by the coups of the past three years.
TAYVAN: Elections in China, which the United States supports, are of great importance.
DETERRY: Haiti, Guatemala and Ethiopia are also concerned about the hearing of the guns in 2024.
10 prophets from famous hedge fund manager
US economist Doug Kass listed 10 likely to occur from the economy to politics in 2024.
Donald Trump is convicted of obstruction and conspiracy: an agreement between former President Donald Trump and current President Joe Biden pardons him in exchange for Trump's acceptance of leaving the 2024 presidential race.
Governor Ron DeSantis is third in both Iowa and New Hampshire to finish third and withdraw from the race. Nicky Haley is the Republican presidential candidate. In early September, Biden faced an emergency health situation, leaving the race, like Trump.
If Trump really leaves the race, Biden is elected Governor Gaviin Newsom. If Trump is still in the race (and if he is not convicted) and Biden has an emergency health condition, the Democrats will appoint Governor Gretchen Whitmer after trying to get Michelle Obama into the fight. She will be the first woman to win, whether she is in competition or Newsome, or between Trump and Whitmer; either Nicky Haley or Gretchen Whitmer.
The 2-Petrol will see $110, and Ukraine will lose territory. The West will continue to lose patience with Ukraine on the course of the war. During the land-sharing talks, Ukraine will have to leave the country's east to Russia. North Korea will enter into conflict in the Military-Autonomous Region with Russia's support and threaten to invade South Korea.
China will continue to play an aggressive war game in the South China Sea, although it does not invade Taiwan. With Russia and Saudi Arabia on the plot to compromise production restrictions, the price of oil will exceed $110 per barrel, while in the United States, the price of gasoline will be close to $6. Exxon Mobil (XOM), Occidental Petroleum (OXY) and Chevron (CVX) will increase their shares by more than one-third next year.
3-9 soft and tough decline: real growth in the United States will be very slow. Unemployment will remain below 4.50 per cent, while wages will rise by 3 per cent to 4 per cent. The Chinese economy will start to recover surprisingly, causing the price of matia to rise and the price of oil to start to improve slowly but permanently. Inflation will not hit much lower levels; it will be well above the Fed's goal.
The Federal Reserve will go on a two-time interest rate cut before July. These policy moves and conditions will lead to a revival of cuff inflation and will lead to more oil price increases at the end of the summer, making the Fed's desire for interest cuts more complicated. Domestic growth has begun to slow in the last six months of the year, and unemployment will not be reduced any more than the rest of the year. The 10-year Treasury bond, which is now at 3.91 per cent, will never fall below 3.75 per cent, and will be in circulation from 3.75 per cent to 4.75 per cent in the majority of the year.
The US-developed recession late this year will lead to 10 per cent or more of the budget deficit, which will boost the Treasury's supply of 10-year revenues again by over 5 per cent. The US federal debt problem is no longer ignored by investors; it will grow even more in late 2024 and will become a slowly serious systemic problem in the years ahead. The creditors will demand more to buy US debt.
The S&P Index will fall below 4,100 amid fears of a 4-petrol price. Despite all the macroeconomic, geopolitical and political drama, the trade gap in most of 2024 will be the weakest region in recent years. The S&P Index will close by about 5-10 per cent. The decline in Apple (AAPL) shares led to the loss of between 10% and 20 per cent of the year in Nasdaq. The market cannot expand further and Russell Index is a loss for the year, as Russell faces financial (reversion) and operational disadvantages.
5-Apple is a significant loss as trade tensions with China increase. With China supporting Huawei, the world's largest and most popular share, Apple loses a significant market share in this country, and overall revenues will fall again in 2024 (over 2023). In the meantime, Google (GOOGL) stops paying Apple $18 billion in search due to the Anti-Trust case. Apple's shares fall below $130 per share. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.B) is an already large Apple stock that is "inverted" to about two billion shares.
The 6-bank sector will suffer major credit losses. Fears of credit problems will occur. The price of commercial property will not be recovered. A wave of commercial real estate failures would cause a new regional banking crisis, forcing the FDIC to negotiate several bank mergers. In 2024, bank shares returned to their lowest levels in 2023.
The wildest acrobats on 7-Wall Street -- private capital -- parabola. The zeroing of credit interest rates, especially in the second half of the year, is still high and the global economy has slowed down, contributing to the failure of private loans. carried out a third of the share of preparing for the development of the vehicle, following the introduction of the BIX (BX) shares of Brighton (BX) and BRIT (the private real estate fund managed by Blackstone) and BXMT. Other private equity shares (Apollo (APO) and (KKR) are falling as the SEC launched an investigation into the failure of the time pricing to effectively market the portfolios of the private capital sector.
8-Elon Musk is found to have a serious addiction problem. Elon Musk, the world's richest man who has been in rehabilitation for a long time, will have to temporarily give up business control over his companies. Tesla's (TSLA) shares will fall to its lowest levels in 2023.
9-Warner Brothers and Paramount Global will be hurt. Warner Brothers Discovery (WBD) and Paramount Global (PARA) are being damaged operational and financially ('unforgetable'). On the brink of the liquidity crisis, Shari Redstone sells Paramount (at a reduced price) to private capital. Disney's (DIS) shares are being traded at $70, and institutional streaming is selling Nelson Peltz with a huge loss. Bill Ackman's Pershing Square hedge fund buys shares of Peltz.
The 10-JP Morgan Chase will have a flag change. Jamie Dimon is a member of the JPM from the JPM. Marianne Lake is the CEO of JP Morgan.

Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares ( NASDAQ:GGLL – Get Free Report ) saw a large increase in short interest in the month of December. As of December 15th, there was short interest totalling 35,200 shares, an increase of 133.1% from the November 30th total of 15,100 shares. Based on an average daily volume of 118,700 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is currently 0.3 days.
 Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares Stock Down 0.3 %
  GGLL stock opened at $31.81 on Friday. The business's fifty day moving average is $30.15 and its 200-day moving average is $29.85. The company has a market cap of $40.40 million, a P/E ratio of 27.70 and a beta of -2.73. Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares has a twelve month low of $16.94 and a twelve month high of $33.19.
  Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares Announces Dividend
  The company also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend, which was paid on Friday, December 29th. Investors of record on Friday, December 22nd were given a $0.2265 dividend. This represents a $0.91 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 2.85%. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Thursday, December 21st.
  Institutional Trading of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares A number of large investors have recently made changes to their positions in GGLL. UBS Group AG bought a new stake in shares of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares in the 1st quarter valued at $86,000. Flow Traders U.S. LLC bought a new stake in shares of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares in the 1st quarter valued at $1,204,000. Susquehanna International Group LLP increased its position in shares of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares by 257.0% in the 1st quarter. Susquehanna International Group LLP now owns 49,861 shares of the company's stock valued at $1,105,000 after buying an additional 35,894 shares in the last quarter. TRUE Private Wealth Advisors bought a new stake in shares of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares in the 2nd quarter valued at $255,000. Finally, Citadel Advisors LLC bought a new stake in shares of Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares in the 2nd quarter valued at $372,000. Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares Company Profile
  The Direxion Daily GOOGL Bull 1.5X Shares ETF (GGLL) is an exchange-traded fund that is based on the Alphabet Inc Class A index. The fund provides 1.5x leveraged exposure, less fees and expenses, to the daily price movement for shares of Google stock. GGLL was launched on Sep 7, 2022 and is managed by Direxion.

stories.title: 4 Reasons to Buy Alphabet Stock and 2 Reasons to Sell

stories.body:
Identificare le azioni di crescita che sovraperformeranno il Nasdaq richiede un approccio pragmatico e lungimirante. Queste aziende mostrano resilienza e dominio di mercato nei rispettivi settori. Con il 2023 che volge al termine, esiste una classe unica di azioni di crescita con un enorme potenziale al rialzo.
 Tuttavia, è importante capire che non tutte le azioni di crescita sono create uguali. Alcune comportano più rischi di altre, quindi gli investitori dovrebbero valutare attentamente la propria tolleranza al rischio. Con possibili tagli ai tassi di interesse nel 2024, queste azioni di crescita possono raggiungere nuove vette.
  Ora, discutiamo le 3 migliori azioni di crescita che supereranno il Nasdaq nel 2024!
  Netflix
  Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) è un servizio di streaming video a pagamento statunitense con sede a Los Gatos, California. È il più grande servizio di streaming al mondo con 247,15 milioni di abbonati.
  Come gigante dello streaming globale, Netflix ha rivoluzionato il modo in cui il pubblico consuma i contenuti. Gli sforzi di ristrutturazione dell'azienda e il focus sull'espansione internazionale hanno stimolato la crescita degli abbonati. Inoltre, la recente lotta di Netflix contro la condivisione delle password dimostra l'impegno a lungo termine dell'azienda per guadagnare quote di mercato.
  Nel terzo trimestre 2023, Netflix ha aggiunto 8,76 milioni di abbonati globali, superando le stime previste grazie al nuovo piano di abbonamento con annunci pubblicitari. Netflix ha ora la capacità di attrarre un pubblico molto più ampio, e gli aumenti recenti dei prezzi potrebbero aumentare la redditività. Con un flusso di cassa disponibile (FCF) che raggiungerà un record di $6,5 miliardi nell'esercizio 2023, Netflix è una delle migliori azioni di crescita da acquistare.
  Alphabet
  L'azienda madre di Google, Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG, GOOGL), rappresenta un'interessante azione di crescita da acquistare nel 2024. L'azienda ha registrato una forte crescita del fatturato e dell'EPS nell'esercizio 2023, principalmente grazie alla domanda di intelligenza artificiale.
  Ma non è l'unico elemento a favore dell'azienda per il nuovo anno. La ricerca di Google e YouTube stanno guidando la crescita dei ricavi pubblicitari, e il 2024 potrebbe essere un anno ancora migliore. Con l'aspettativa di un atterraggio morbido, la volontà delle aziende di assumere maggiori rischi nell'allocazione di capitale potrebbe essere un fattore determinante. Nei suoi ultimi risultati trimestrali , il fatturato di Alphabet è cresciuto del 11% anno su anno, arrivando a $76,7 miliardi.
  Tuttavia, ancora più impressionante è stato il margine di profitto operativo di $21,3 miliardi. Il business cloud di Google è stato un fattore trainante e l'intelligenza artificiale continuerà a stimolare il momentum in futuro. Il suo nuovo modello di intelligenza artificiale Gemini non deve essere sottovalutato, dato che gli esponenti vantano la sua superiorità rispetto al modello GPT-3.5 di OpenAI.
  Shopify
  Shopify (NYSE: SHOP) ha riconquistato lo status di capitalizzazione di mercato di $100 miliardi e il 2024 potrebbe essere un anno importante. Dopo consistenti perdite nel 2022, gli sforzi di ristrutturazione hanno aumentato la fiducia degli investitori.
  La dirigenza ha apportato cambiamenti strutturali nell'azienda che potrebbero cominciare a concretizzarsi nel nuovo anno. Tra questi vi è la vendita della sua attività logistica a Flexport. Questa mossa ha avuto un impatto immediato, con il margine di profitto operativo che passa da negativo a positivo. Ciò ha anche rafforzato la liquidità di Shopify, mettendola in una buona posizione per sfruttare le opportunità di mercato nell'ambito dell'intelligenza artificiale. Inoltre, Shopify ha ridotto del 20% il proprio organico poiché la redditività ha ostacolato la crescita nell'anno precedente.
  Gli analisti prevedono che l'azienda aumenterà il ricavo totale del 20% nell'esercizio 2024. Concretizzandosi gli sforzi di riduzione dei costi, Shopify è una delle migliori azioni di crescita che supereranno il Nasdaq nel 2024.

sentences: Identificare le azioni di crescita che sovraperformeranno
Con un flusso di cassa disponibile (FCF) che raggiungerà un record di $6,5 miliardi nell'esercizio 2023, Netflix è una delle migliori azioni di crescita da acquistare.
L'azienda ha registrato una forte crescita del fatturato e dell'EPS nell'esercizio 2023, principalmente grazie alla domanda di intelligenza artificiale.
Concretizzandosi gli sforzi di riduzione dei costi, Shopify è una delle migliori azioni di crescita che supereranno il Nasdaq nel 2024.
Gli sforzi di ristrutturazione dell'azienda e il focus sull'espansione internazionale hanno stimolato la crescita degli abbonati.

stories.title: I Titoli Growth che sovraperformeranno il Nasdaq nel 2024

en.body:
Identifying the growth actions that the Nasdaq will do requires a pragmatic and forward-looking approach. These companies show resilience and market dominance in their respective sectors. With 2023 coming to an end, there is a single class of growth actions with enormous potential for recovery.
However, it is important to understand that not all growth actions are created equally. Some risk more than others, so investors should carefully assess their risk tolerance. With possible interest-rate cuts in 2024, these growth actions can reach new targets.
Now, we are discussing the three best growth actions that will surpass Nasdaq in 2024!
Netflix
Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) is an American video streaming service based in Los Gatos, California. It is the largest streaming service in the world with 247.15 million subscribers.
As a global streaming giant, Netflix revolutionized the way the public consumes content. The efforts to restructure the company and the focus on international expansion have encouraged the growth of the subscribers. In addition, the recent fight by Netflix against the sharing of passwords shows the company's long-term commitment to gain market share.
In the third quarter of 2023, Netflix added 8.76 million global subscribers, exceeding the estimates provided by the new subscription plan with advertising announcements. Netflix now has the ability to attract a much wider audience, and recent price increases could increase profitability. With a available cash flow (FCF) that will reach a record $6.5 billion in the 2023 fiscal year, Netflix is one of the best growth actions to be bought.
Alphabet
Google's mother company, Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG, GOOGL), is an interesting growth action to be bought in 2024. The company recorded a strong growth in the invoice and EPS in the 2023 financial year, mainly due to the demand for artificial intelligence.
But it is not the only thing that is in favour of the company for the new year. Google and YouTube are driving the growth of advertising revenue, and 2024 could be a better year. With the expectation of a dead landing, the will of companies to take greater risks in capital allocation could be a decisive factor. In its latest quarterly results, the Alphabet bill grew by 11% year over year, reaching $76.7 billion.
However, even more impressive was the operating profit margin of $21.3 billion. Google's business Cloud was a driving factor, and artificial intelligence will continue to stimulate momentum in the future. Its new model of artificial intelligence Gemini should not be underestimated, as the exhibitors have their superiority over the GPT-3.5 model of OpenAI.
Shopify
Shopify (NYSE: SHOP) has regained the market capitalisation status of $100 billion, and 2024 could be an important year. After significant losses in 2022, restructuring efforts have increased investor confidence.
Management has made structural changes in the company which could start to take place in the new year. Among these is the sale of his logistics at Flexport. This move has had an immediate impact, with the operating profit margin going from negative to positive. This has also strengthened the liquidity of Shopify, putting it in a good position to exploit market opportunities in the field of artificial intelligence. In addition, Shopify has reduced its organic by 20% because profitability has hampered growth in the previous year.
Analysts predict that the company will increase its total revenue by 20% in the 2024 financial year. By concreteizing cost reduction efforts, Shopify is one of the best growth actions that Nasdaq will do in 2024.
en.title: The Groth titles that will dominate Nasdaq in 2024

stories.body:
digital advertising company Alphabet (GOOG -0.25%) (GOOGL -0.39%) Highly influential brands like Google, YouTube, Google Cloud and Chrome are being used extensively by billions of users.
With its fantastic ecosystem of products and services, Alphabet has access to heaps of valuable data. This data has also played a major role in helping Alphabet build its AI capabilities over the past decade.
  However, all is not well for the company. While there are some reasons to like the stock, there are at least two that have investors concerned.
  Strength in the main digital advertising business
  Google's share of the global desktop search engine market was about 83.5% in July 2023, down from 84% share in July 2022. On the other hand, the other major search player Microsoft Bing's share has increased from 8.8% in July 2022 to 9.2% in July 2023.
  Although some analysts believe this trend is worrying, all is not lost. Google still leads the global digital advertising market with about 39% revenue share. Thanks to Alphabet's ability to deliver targeted advertising to users effectively and efficiently, Google and YouTube continue to attract advertisers. In the third quarter, strength in retail drove advertising revenue growth for the Google search engine, while brand and direct response advertising was a major catalyst for the YouTube platform.
  AI-driven improvements in advertising business
  Alphabet has launched a feature called Search Generative Experience (SGE), which integrates generative artificial intelligence (AI) into the Google search engine to provide relevant, natural and intuitive responses. The company is also experimenting with integrating its recently launched and most advanced Gemini Large Language Model (LLM) into SGE. The AI-powered results are expected to help improve user experience and advertisers' performance and profitability. Innovations like conversational capabilities in Google Ads, new campaign types, and new ad formats will enable advertisers to reach new potential customers. This could help expand Alphabet's advertiser base as well as its revenue potential.
  Gemini versions for different use cases
  Alphabet is also leveraging advanced AI and machine learning technologies to drive innovation and efficiency in industries such as finance, healthcare, retail and transportation. To ensure optimal and cost-effective utilization of computational and financial resources, the company has introduced Gemini LLM in three variants: Nano, Pro and Ultra. While Nano is optimized for on-device tasks, the Pro version is used for many scalable tasks. Gemini Ultra is being developed for large and highly complex operations. All these initiatives mean that Gemini could prove to be a tough competition for OpenAI's ChatGPT.
  Google Cloud Business Opportunities
  Alphabet's AI initiative will also boost the already strong Google Cloud business. In the third quarter, Google Cloud revenue grew 22% year over year to $8.4 billion due to growing demand for its portfolio of infrastructure, data analytics, AI, collaboration and productivity solutions. The company's focus on hybrid and multicloud environments has also been a huge positive for customers looking to seamlessly integrate Google Cloud services with on-premise infrastructure and other cloud providers. The integration of the Gemini Pro model with Google Cloud is also expected to increase the demand for Google Cloud Platform services.
  risks to consider
  Many analysts are expressing concerns about the viability of the company's core search-driven advertising business in light of the growing popularity of the Bing search engine. Although this risk cannot be ignored, Alphabet is working hard to catch up with Microsoft in the AI ​​game.
  Although Gemini's public debut was imperfect, its multimodality (ability to understand and handle multiple data types, such as text, images, audio, and video) may emerge as a solid advantage over OpenAI's models such as GPT-3.5 and GPT-4. Is. The model will have multiple real-world use cases across consumer and enterprise sectors. As use of the Gemini model continues to grow through SGE and Bard, ad performance will increase significantly. This could help Alphabet secure its leadership position in the digital advertising sector.
  The recent legal defeat against Epic Games is also being seen as a challenge to Alphabet's Play App Store business. The case could also open a Pandora's box for Alphabet, prompting many more game developers to challenge Alphabet's dominance and potential anti-competitive behavior in the gaming landscape. Although this is a possibility, the situation has not yet materialized.
  Against the backdrop of multiple growth drivers and a manageable risk profile, Alphabet appears to be an attractive option for 2024 and beyond.
  Suzanne Frey, an Alphabet executive, is a member of The Motley Fool's board of directors. Manali Bhade has no position in any of the stocks mentioned. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Alphabet and Microsoft. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy.
  Source: www.bing.com

sentences: digital advertising company Alphabet (GOOG -0.25%) (GOOGL -0.39%)

AI-driven improvements in advertising business
  Alphabet has launched a feature called Search Generative Experience (SGE), which integrates generative artificial intelligence (AI) into the Google search engine to provide relevant, natural and intuitive responses.

Google Cloud Business Opportunities
  Alphabet's AI initiative will also boost the already strong Google Cloud business.
Thanks to Alphabet's ability to deliver targeted advertising to users effectively and efficiently, Google and YouTube continue to attract advertisers.

Strength in the main digital advertising business
  Google's share of the global desktop search engine market was about 83.5% in July 2023, down from 84% share in July 2022.

InvestorPlace - Stock Market News, Stock Advice & Trading Tips  Identifying growth stocks that will outperform the Nasdaq requires both a pragmatic and forward-thinking approach.
These companies exhibit resilience and market dominance in their respective industries. With 2023 coming to an end, there exists a unique class of growth stocks with enormous upside potential.
  However, it is important to understand that not all growth stocks are created equally. Some carry more risk than others, so investors should carefully evaluate their risk tolerance. With interest rate cuts on the table in 2024, these growth stocks can soar to new heights.
  Now, let's discuss the 3 best growth stocks that will outperform the Nasdaq in 2024!
  Netflix (NFLX)
  Source: izzuanroslan / Shutterstock.com
  Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX is an American video subscription streaming service headquartered in Los Gatos, California. It is the largest streaming service in the world with 247.15 million subscribers.
  As a global streaming giant, Netflix has revolutionized the way audiences consume content. The company's restructuring efforts and focus on international expansion has boosted subscriber growth. Additionally, Netflix's recent crackdown on password sharing shows the company's long-term commitment to market share gains.
  In Q3 2023 , Netflix added 8.76 million global subscribers. This was above guided estimates with it's new ad-plan membership gaining traction. Netflix now has the ability to appeal to a much wider audience, and recent price hikes could increase profitability. With FCF set to hit a record of $6.5 billion in FY23, Netflix is one of the best growth stocks to buy.
  Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL)
  Source: K.unshu / Shutterstock.com
  Google's parent company, Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG , NASDAQ: GOOGL ), stands as a compelling growth stock to buy for 2024. The company has seen strong revenue and EPS growth in FY23, largely driven by the demand for artificial intelligence.
  But that is not the only thing going for the company going into the new year. Google Search and YouTube are driving advertising revenue growth, and 2024 might be an even better year. With the expectations of a soft landing, companies' risk appetite to allocate more capital might be a key driver. In it's latest quarterly results , Alphabet revenue grew 11% YOY to $76.7 billion.
  However, what was more impressive is the company's operating income hitting $21.3 billion. Google's cloud business was a primary driver and AI will continue to drive momentum moving forward. Its new Gemini AI model should not be overlooked, as executives boast its superiority over OpenAI's GPT-3.5 model.
  Shopify (SHOP)
  Source: Burdun Iliya / Shutterstock.com
  Shopify (NYSE: SHOP has reclaimed the $100 billion market capitalization status and 2024 could be a huge year. After significant losses in 2022, restructuring efforts have boosted investor confidence.
  Management has made structural changes in the business that could start to materialize in the new year. One of them being the sale of its logistics business to Flexport . The move saw an immediate impact, with operating income swinging from negative to positive. This has also strengthened Shopify's liquidity, making it well positioned to capitalize on the market opportunities in AI. Additionally, Shopify cut 20% of their workforce as profitability has plagued growth in the year prior.
  Analysts project the company to grow top line revenue by 20% FY24. With cost-cutting efforts materializing, Shopify is one of the top growth stocks that will outperform the Nasdaq in 2024.
  On the date of publication, Terel Miles did not have (either directly or indirectly) any positions in the securities mentioned in this article. The opinions expressed in this article are those of the writer, subject to the InvestorPlace.com Publishing Guidelines

  The post 3 Growth Stocks Set to Outperform the Nasdaq in 2024 appeared first on InvestorPlace

sentences: InvestorPlace - Stock Market News, Stock Advice & Trading Tips  Identifying growth stocks that will outperform the Nasdaq requires both a pragmatic and forward-thinking approach.

Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL)
  Source: K.unshu / Shutterstock.com
  Google's parent company, Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG , NASDAQ: GOOGL ), stands as a compelling growth stock to buy for 2024.
With FCF set to hit a record of $6.5 billion in FY23, Netflix is one of the best growth stocks to buy.
With cost-cutting efforts materializing, Shopify is one of the top growth stocks that will outperform the Nasdaq in 2024.
The company's restructuring efforts and focus on international expansion has boosted subscriber growth.

stories.title: 3 Growth Stocks Set to Outperform the Nasdaq in 2024

stories.body:
Digital advertising company Alphabet's (GOOG -0.25%) (GOOGL -0.39%) highly influential brands such as Google, YouTube, Google Cloud, and Chrome are being used extensively by billions of users. With its stellar ecosystem of products and services, Alphabet enjoys access to mounds of valuable data. This data has also played a major role in helping Alphabet build its AI capabilities over the past decade.

However, all is not rosy for the company. While there are a few reasons to like the stock, there are at least two that have investors worried.

Strength in the core digital advertising business

Google accounted for nearly 83.5% of the global desktop search engine market in July 2023, lower than the 84% share in July 2022. On the other hand, the second-leading search player Microsoft Bing's share has increased from 8.8% in July 2022 to 9.2% in July 2023.

While some analysts find the trend worrisome, all is not lost. Google is still a leader in the global digital advertising market with a revenue share of around 39%. Thanks to Alphabet's ability to effectively and efficiently deliver targeted advertisements to users, Google and YouTube continue to attract advertisers. In the third quarter, strength in the retail vertical drove up advertising revenue for the Google search engine, while brand and direct response advertising was a major catalyst for the YouTube platform.

AI-powered improvements in the advertising business

Alphabet has launched a feature called Search Generative Experience (SGE), which integrates generative artificial intelligence (AI) into the Google search engine to provide contextual, natural, and intuitive responses. The company is also experimenting with integrating its recently launched and most advanced Gemini large language model (LLM) in SGE. The AI-driven results are expected to help improve user experience and advertisers' performance and profitability. Innovations such as conversational capabilities in Google Ads, new campaign types, and new ad formats will further enable advertisers to reach new potential customers. This can help expand Alphabet's advertiser base as well as its revenue potential.

Gemini variants for different use cases

Alphabet is also leveraging advanced AI and machine learning technologies to drive innovation and efficiency across industries such as finance, healthcare, retail, and transportation. To ensure optimal and cost-effective use of computational and financial resources, the company has introduced Gemini LLM in three variants: Nano, Pro, and Ultra. While Nano is optimized for on-device tasks, the Pro version is used for a range of scalable tasks. Gemini Ultra is being developed for large and highly complex tasks. All these initiatives imply that Gemini may prove to be a tough competition to OpenAI's ChatGPT.

Opportunities in Google Cloud business

Alphabet's AI initiatives will also boost the already robust Google Cloud business. In the third quarter, Google Cloud's revenue was up 22% year over year to $8.4 billion, driven by rising demand for its portfolio of infrastructure, data analytics, AI, collaboration, and productivity solutions. The company's focus on hybrid and multicloud environments has also been a major positive for customers keen on seamlessly integrating Google Cloud services with on-premise infrastructure and other cloud providers. Integration of the Gemini Pro model with Google Cloud is also expected to boost demand for Google Cloud Platform services.

Risks to consider

Many analysts have been voicing worries about the viability of the company's core search-driven advertising business in the wake of the increasing popularity of the Bing search engine. While this risk cannot be ignored, Alphabet is working hard to catch up with Microsoft in the AI game.

Although Gemini's public debut was imperfect, its multimodality (ability to understand and handle multiple data types such as text, images, audio, and video) can emerge as a tangible benefit over OpenAI's models such as GPT-3.5 and GPT-4. The model will have multiple real-world use cases in consumer and enterprise segments. As the use of the Gemini model through SGE and Bard continues to grow, there will be a significant increase in ad performance. This can help Alphabet safeguard its leadership position in the digital advertising space.

The recent legal defeat against Epic Games is also seen as a challenge to Alphabet's Play app store business. This case may also open a Pandora's box for Alphabet, driving many more game developers to challenge Alphabet's dominance and potentially anticompetitive behavior in the gaming landscape. While this is a possibility, the situation has not yet materialized.

Against the backdrop of the many growth drivers and a manageable risk profile, Alphabet seems to be a compelling pick for 2024 and beyond.

AI-powered improvements in the advertising business

Opportunities in Google Cloud business

Alphabet's AI initiatives will also boost the already robust Google Cloud business.

Strength in the core digital advertising business

Google accounted for nearly 83.5% of the global desktop search engine market in July 2023, lower than the 84% share in July 2022.

In the third quarter, strength in the retail vertical drove up advertising revenue for the Google search engine, while brand and direct response advertising was a major catalyst for the YouTube platform.

stories.title: 4 Reasons to Buy Alphabet Stock and 2 Reasons to Sell
